Isma'il I commissioned an expedition to explore the Equatoria region south of the Sudan
column3: and to organize a new Egyptian province there. A British explorer and engineer named Samuel White Baker who had led an expedition down the Nile in 1865 was contracted by the Khedive to lead the Egyptian forces and to be the first Governor-General of the new territory..;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;

column2: Isma'il I moved to incorporate the territory of Darfur into the Egyptian Sudan in 1874.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: anti_italy_desc;Our regional rivals are promoting pan-Italian nationalism in an attempt to legitimize the conquest of their neighbors! We must form a counter bloc to stop their clearly expansionist policy.
italy_victory_desc;The Italian peninsula has been united! No longer will pretender elements exist within Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

anti_italy_victory_desc;We have crushed our pathetic rival's attempt at unifying the Italian peninsula under their guise of nationalism. Now we must unite the Italian peninsula under OUR guise of nationalism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

ait_italia_irredenta_desc;The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia
a region that is historically Italian
column3: is within our grasp and many Italians live in the lands around it to this day. It's time to assert our hegemony on the territory around it
column4: safeguarding the Italians that still live there.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: annex_ai_australia_desc;If Australia is AI for the first year of the game
column2: you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: annex_ai_south_africa_desc;If South Africa is AI for the first year of the game
column2: you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: annex_ai_canada_desc;If Canada is AI for the first year of the game
column2: you may annex it automatically with this decision. DO NOT WAIT.;;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: EVTDESC9999901;This event converts all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores into artisans.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unciv_protection_on_desc;China and Japan specific decision that protects you until 1865 from acquire land CBs
column2: but also blocks you from building them.USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unciv_protection_off_desc;China and Japan specific decision that turns off your protection from acquire land CBs
column2: that you otherwise would have until 1865. USE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: craftsmen_fix_desc;This decision is intended to salvage your country after it has been craftsmen hijacked. It will revert all non-core/non-accepted craftsmen on your cores to artisans so that your core craftsmen will start working. (Think South Germans in Venetia hijacking.) BECAREFUL OF USE.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
bureaucrats_fix_desc;This decision is intended to convert non-accepted Bureaucrats into Artisans
column2: in both states and colonies
column3: so they stop getting fat off of state admin funding.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: britain_sphere_jap_title;Ask The British Empire for Support;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
britain_sphere_jap_desc;The world's oceans are big enough for the two of us
column2: surely the British Empire will understand then that we require her resources to prosper in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836);;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: usa_sphere_jap_title;Ask the United States for Support;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
usa_sphere_jap_desc;Clearly we cannot trust other interests in Asia
column2: but we can't fuel this machine on good will. There appears to be a budding nation across the Pacific... they may be able to provide us with markets in our time of need. (Decision only available in 1836);;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rus_sphere_jap_desc;If our interests are in China
column2: then surely allying ourselves with the next best thing to overcome her would be the right course of action. (Decision only available in 1836);;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: player_alliances_desc;Automatically allies all player nations. DO NOT SPAM.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_cb_desc;Enables total annexation CBs for players in the game. (Requires no building);;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_cb_safety_desc;Disables the safety on enabling Total Annexation CBs.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
csa_core_cleanup_desc;This decision removes the old CSA cores to help prevent a weird rebel issue that occurs because of core changes for the assimilation rework.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_peru_bolivia_confederation_desc;The time to unite the Andean peoples is upon us! We must create a vanguard nation state to call all Andeans home. Long live Peru-Bolivia!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
fuck_ai_immigration_desc;This decision removes AI nations from immigration priority entirely. Immigrants will only go to player nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: there were land reforms in Mexico very similar to the United States Homestead Act.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: assert_on_steppe_desc;The Major Powers chaffing at our periphery is inclining us to attempt projecting into the steppe
column2: but who could possibly own such a vast region with land ownership? The real value is the people themselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: double_down_in_the_balkans_desc;For too long have the peoples of the Balkans thwarted our efforts of expansion. Let us focus all our attention to the re-education and assimilation of these barbaric peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it was inevitable that the leather industry advance as well.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: industrial_tanneries_desc;In the Victorian era tanneries were often close to the abattoirs and so the skins would often arrive at the tannery fresh and unsalted. With industrial levels of meat consumption

column2: giving us international recognition as a truly free state.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column1: political_reformed_nation_desc;Our country political reforms match every liberal demand
